UPRI EarthquakeHub
  • HTTP Routing Table

HTTP Routing Table

/accounts | /device | /eq-events | /messaging | /notifications | /servers | /stream
 
/accounts
GET /accounts/profile Return user information if accessToken is in cookie
POST /accounts/authenticate Return a JWT in exchange for username, password, & role
POST /accounts/register Create a new account given user information
POST /accounts/signout Clear citizen's accessToken in cookie
POST /accounts/verify-sensor-token Tell a brgy whether a sensor's JWT came from this server
 
/device
GET /device/all Return all added (not necessarily linked) devices with their location
GET /device/info Read device information from a JSON file
GET /device/my-devices Return list of devices belonging to the authenticated (citizen) user
GET /device/status Return the status of a specified device
POST /device/add Add a device to the user's account
POST /device/link Link the rshake device to a registered account in earthquake-hub network
 
/eq-events
GET /eq-events Get recorded seismic events in the network within a specific time range
 
/messaging
GET /messaging SSE endpoint to stream SC_PICK or SC_EVENT messages to the client.
POST /messaging/restricted/new-event Add new EQevent as message in SSE, entry in DB, and notif to subscribed clients.
POST /messaging/restricted/new-pick Add new PICK as message to SSE.
 
/notifications
POST /notifications/subscribe Subscribe to web-push notifications.
 
/servers
GET /servers/getList Read list of servers saved in a JSON file
POST /servers/add Add a ringserver to the list
 
/stream
GET /stream/status Get streaming status to each server
POST /stream/start Start slink2dali streaming to specified servers in the local file store
